title.zh: 《六國年表》 Yearly Chronicle of the Six States
title.raw: 《六國年表》 Yearly Chronicle of the Six States

sentences.zh: 太史公讀秦記，至犬戎敗幽王，周東徙洛邑，秦襄公始封為諸侯，作西畤用事上帝，僭端見矣。

translations.text: Grand Historian read Qin records, to Quan Rong defeated You Wang, Zhou moved east to Luo Yi, Qin Xiang Gong began enfeoffed as feudal lord, made Xi Zhi to serve Shang Di, the usurping signs appeared.

sentences.zh: 《禮》曰：「天子祭天地，諸侯祭其域內名山大川。」

translations.text: The Rites say: 'Son of Heaven sacrifices to Heaven and Earth, feudal lords sacrifice to famous mountains and great rivers within their domain.'

sentences.zh: 今秦雜戎翟之俗，先暴戾，後仁義，位在藩臣而臚於郊祀，君子懼焉。

translations.text: Now Qin mixes Rong Di customs, first tyrannical, later benevolent righteousness, position among border ministers yet performs suburban sacrifices, gentlemen fear this.

sentences.zh: 及文公踰隴，攘夷狄，尊陳寶，營岐雍之閒，而穆公修政，東竟至河，則與齊桓、晉文中國侯伯侔矣。

translations.text: And Wen Gong crossed Long, drove out Yi Di, honored Chen Bao, built between Qi Yong, and Mu Gong reformed government, eastern border reached Yellow River, then equaled Qi Huan, Jin Wen among China's hegemon lords.

sentences.zh: 是後陪臣執政，大夫世祿，六卿擅晉權，征伐會盟，威重於諸侯。

translations.text: After this, assistant ministers held power, great officers hereditary stipends, six ministers monopolized Jin power, campaigns and alliances, authority heavier than feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 及田常殺簡公而相齊國，諸侯晏然弗討，海內爭於戰功矣。

translations.text: And Tian Chang killed Jian Gong and became chancellor of Qi state, feudal lords peacefully did not attack, within the seas contended for battle merits.

sentences.zh: 三國終之卒分晉，田和亦滅齊而有之，六國之盛自此始。

translations.text: Three states ultimately divided Jin, Tian He also extinguished Qi and possessed it, the Six States' flourishing from this began.

sentences.zh: 務在彊兵并敵，謀詐用而從衡短長之說起。

translations.text: Dedicated to strengthening troops and annexing enemies, scheming deceit used and horizontal vertical long short theories arose.

sentences.zh: 矯稱蜂出，誓盟不信，雖置質剖符猶不能約束也。

translations.text: False claims swarmed out, oaths and alliances not trusted, though established hostages divided tallies still could not restrain.

sentences.zh: 秦始小國僻遠，諸夏賓之，比於戎翟，至獻公之後常雄諸侯。

translations.text: Qin began as small country remote, the various Xia treated as guest, compared to Rong Di, to Xian Gong after often was strong among feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 論秦之德義不如魯衛之暴戾者，量秦之兵不如三晉之彊也，然卒并天下，非必險固便形勢利也，蓋若天所助焉。

translations.text: Discussing Qin's virtue righteousness not as Lu Wei's tyrannical, measuring Qin's troops not as Three Jin's strong, yet ultimately united the world, not necessarily dangerous solid convenient terrain advantage, probably like Heaven assisted.

Grand Historian read Qin records, to Quan Rong defeated You Wang, Zhou moved east to Luo Yi, Qin Xiang Gong began enfeoffed as feudal lord, made Xi Zhi to serve Shang Di, the usurping signs appeared. The Rites say: 'Son of Heaven sacrifices to Heaven and Earth, feudal lords sacrifice to famous mountains and great rivers within their domain.' Now Qin mixes Rong Di customs, first tyrannical, later benevolent righteousness, position among border ministers yet performs suburban sacrifices, gentlemen fear this. And Wen Gong crossed Long, drove out Yi Di, honored Chen Bao, built between Qi Yong, and Mu Gong reformed government, eastern border reached Yellow River, then equaled Qi Huan, Jin Wen among China's hegemon lords. After this, assistant ministers held power, great officers hereditary stipends, six ministers monopolized Jin power, campaigns and alliances, authority heavier than feudal lords. And Tian Chang killed Jian Gong and became chancellor of Qi state, feudal lords peacefully did not attack, within the seas contended for battle merits. Three states ultimately divided Jin, Tian He also extinguished Qi and possessed it, the Six States' flourishing from this began. Dedicated to strengthening troops and annexing enemies, scheming deceit used and horizontal vertical long short theories arose. False claims swarmed out, oaths and alliances not trusted, though established hostages divided tallies still could not restrain. Qin began as small country remote, the various Xia treated as guest, compared to Rong Di, to Xian Gong after often was strong among feudal lords. Discussing Qin's virtue righteousness not as Lu Wei's tyrannical, measuring Qin's troops not as Three Jin's strong, yet ultimately united the world, not necessarily dangerous solid convenient terrain advantage, probably like Heaven assisted.

sentences.zh: 或曰「東方物所始生，西方物之成孰」。

translations.text: Some say 'Eastern things begin to be born, Western things mature.'

sentences.zh: 夫作事者必於東南，收功實者常於西北。

translations.text: Indeed those who do affairs must in southeast, those who reap achievements often in northwest.

sentences.zh: 故禹興於西羌，湯起於亳，周之王也以豐鎬伐殷，秦之帝用雍州興，漢之興自蜀漢。

translations.text: Therefore Yu rose from Western Qiang, Tang arose from Bo, Zhou's kings used Feng Hao to attack Yin, Qin's emperor used Yong province rose, Han's rise from Shu Han.

Some say 'Eastern things begin to be born, Western things mature.' Indeed those who do affairs must in southeast, those who reap achievements often in northwest. Therefore Yu rose from Western Qiang, Tang arose from Bo, Zhou's kings used Feng Hao to attack Yin, Qin's emperor used Yong province rose, Han's rise from Shu Han.

sentences.zh: 秦既得意，燒天下詩書，諸侯史記尤甚，為其有所刺譏也。

translations.text: Qin having achieved ambition, burned world's poetry books, feudal lords' histories especially, because they had some satire mockery.

sentences.zh: 詩書所以復見者，多藏人家，而史記獨藏周室，以故滅。

translations.text: Poetry books so reappeared, mostly hidden in people's homes, but histories only hidden in Zhou chambers, so extinguished.

sentences.zh: 獨有秦記，又不載日月，其文略不具。

translations.text: Only Qin records exist, but not record days months, the text brief not complete.

sentences.zh: 然戰國之權變亦有可頗采者，何必上古。

translations.text: Though however, to discuss the Six States' affairs, the record is this.

sentences.zh: 秦取天下多暴，然世異變，成功大。

translations.text: However, the Six States' records, Qin record is the most detailed.
Now taking Qin as the center, and the Six States' years as the side, to make this Yearly Chronicle of the Six States.

sentences.zh: 以其近己而俗變相類，議卑而易行也。

translations.text: However, the Six States' kings' names and years, are also mostly taken from Qin records.

sentences.zh: 學者牽於所聞，見秦在帝位日淺，不察其終始，因舉而笑之，不敢道，此與以耳食無異。

translations.text: Now the year numbers: Zhou Ping Wang east moved, the first year.
Qin Xiang Gong enfeoffed as feudal lord, the eighth year.
